mapper.select: SELECT wmt.id ,wmt.corp_id ,wmt.moment_id ,wmt.job_id ,wmt.content ,wmt.type ,wmt.task_type ,wmt.status ,wmt.send_time ,wmt.users ,wmt.tags FROM we_moment_task wmt WHERE wmt.status = 0 AND wmt.task_type = 1 AND wmt.send_time <= #{now}

SELECT SUM(IF(wmtr.publish_status = 0,1,0)) as notPublishNum ,SUM(IF(wmtr.publish_status = 1,1,0)) as publishNum ,SUM(IF(wmtr.publish_status = 2,1,0)) as expireNum ,count(1) as userNum ,wmt.update_time FROM we_moment_task wmt LEFT JOIN we_moment_task_result wmtr ON wmt.id = wmtr.moment_task_id WHERE wmtr.moment_task_id = #{momentTaskId}

SELECT wmt.id as momentTaskId, wmt.content, wmt.type, wmt.task_type, wmt.`status`, wmt.send_time, wmt.tags, wmt.push_range, wmt.select_user, wmt.users, wmt.departments, IF(wmt.`create_by` != 'admin',wu.user_name,wmt.`create_by`) as create_by, '' as momentContent, wmt.create_time FROM we_moment_task wmt LEFT JOIN we_user wu ON wmt.create_by = wu.user_id AND wmt.corp_id = wu.corp_id WHERE wmt.id = #{momentTaskId} AND wmt.corp_id = #{corpId} LIMIT 1

SELECT wmt.id as momentTaskId, wmt.content, wmt.corp_id, wmt.type, wmt.`status`, wmt.send_time, wmt.tags, wmt.push_range, wmt.select_user, '' as momentContent, wmtr.publish_status, wmt.create_time FROM we_moment_task wmt LEFT JOIN we_moment_task_result wmtr on wmtr.moment_task_id = wmt.id WHERE wmt.id = #{momentTaskId} AND wmtr.user_id = #{userId}
